item.title: Slides: Fullscreen
item.description: Web Servers Purpose Program that allows you to serve web pages to the end user Protocols HTTP: Hypertext Transfer Protocol HTTPS: Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure Web Servers Covered Caddy: Serve files and reverse proxy, automatic HTTPS Nginx: Serve files and reverse proxy, no automatic HTTPS Both of the above web servers can accomplish the same tasks Use Cases This course utilizes Caddy and NGINX to server static files as web applications for the following:
